actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Appropriations.
Reported to House from the Committee on Appropriations, with amendments, H. Rept. 94-166.

official_title: Joint resolution making emergency supplemental appropriations for assistance to the Republic of South Vietnam for the fiscal year ending June 30, 1975.

summary.text: (Reported to House from the Committee on Appropriations, with amendments, H. Rept. 94-166) Makes supplemental appropriations for fiscal year 1975 of $165,000,000 for additional military assistance to South Vietnamese forces and $165,000,000 for additional Indochina postwar reconstruction assistance.

titles.title: Joint resolution making emergency supplemental appropriations for assistance to the Republic of South Vietnam for the fiscal year ending June 30, 1975.
